title: Scar On The Sky
description: Gerwyn is the man of Sarah’s dreams. Handsome and attentive, he is everything she could ever want. As her attraction deepens into love, she begins to wonder if her townsfolk are right - that she really is crazy. After all, he is a figment of her imagination, only coming to life when she sleeps. Then, one day Sarah looks up and sees a scar on the sky above Rockington, a sign her dreams are more reality than fantasy.Gerwyn has fallen for Sarah. The strange scar on the sky is the evidence he has left his existence as an angel behind and a call for Sarah to come find him. A call she answers.United in the mortal world, their bond is forged even deeper, but Gerwyn’s fall has not gone unnoticed. Will the power of love be enough to save him, or will their fairytale romance be denied a happy ending?Rockington. A small town with big secrets.
author: Angela J. Maher
